trustfund:
TF053765-PHRD-EL SALVADOR: SOCIAL
            PROTECTION AND LOCAL DEVELOPMENT (FISDL)
theme: Nutrition and food security,Child health,Population and reproductive health,Participation and civic engagement,Rural services and infrastructure

abstracts.cdata!:
This Results Profile focuses on Social
            Protection Project in El Salvador. One of the most critical
            challenges for development faced by El Salvador was to
            strengthen the poor populations. The project supported
            Conditional Cash Transfer Program, which encouraged
            extremely poor households to send the five to fifteen years
            old children to preschool and primary education. It expanded
            the supply of basic health and nutrition services,
            strengthened community-based health care interventions to
            prevent chronic malnutrition amongst the poor. It ensured
            that all target household members were incorporated into the
            vital statistics bureau and have the necessary personal
            identification documents to access basic public services.
